summary: This is an email chain from June 2022 regarding a Director award nomination that requires concurrence from the FBI's New York Field Office. The nomination appears to be related to the Epstein/Maxwell case, as indicated by the attachment filename. The email is sent by a Special Agent from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded email from the FBI New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk, discussing a Director award nomination concurrence related to the Epstein/Maxwell case.

events.title: Director Award Nomination Concurrence Request
events.description: An email is sent regarding a Director award nomination that requires concurrence, with attachments related to the Epstein/Maxwell case.

events.title: Follow-up on Award Nomination
events.description: A follow-up email is sent inquiring about the review of the Director award nomination concurrence form.

keyFacts: The document is a 2022 email chain concerning a Director award nomination requiring concurrence.
The nomination is linked to the Epstein/Maxwell case, as indicated by the attachment filename 'USAO_Supervisor_Concurrence_FormiEpsteins _Maxwell).pdf'.
The correspondence involves the FBI New York Field Office's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk.
The email suggests ongoing administrative or recognition processes related to the case years after the main prosecutions.
